title: Ghorepani Poon Hill Trek
description: A classic short trek offering 180-degree views of the Annapurna and Dhaulagiri ranges. Perfect for those with limited time but wanting a full Himalayan experience.
highlights:
Poon Hill Sunrise
Ancient Rhododendron forests
Traditional Gurung villages
itinerary:
Day 1: Drive to Nayapul, Trek to Tikhedhunga
Day 2: Trek to Ghorepani
Day 3: Sunrise hike to Poon Hill, Trek to Tadapani
Day 4: Trek to Ghandruk
Day 5: Trek back to Nayapul and drive to Pokhara

title: Lumbini Pilgrimage Tour
description: Visit the birthplace of Lord Buddha, a UNESCO World Heritage site and a spiritual sanctuary for peace seekers.
highlights:
Maya Devi Temple
Ashoka Pillar
World Peace Pagoda
itinerary:
Day 1: Arrival in Lumbini and hotel transfer
Day 2: Full day exploration of Sacred Garden and Monastic Zone
Day 3: Visit Tilaurakot and departure
inclusions: Hotel stay, Breakfast, Local guide, Private vehicle

title: Upper Dolpo Wilderness Trek
description: An expedition into one of Nepal's most remote and rugged areas. Experience untouched Tibetan culture and the crystal blue waters of Phoksundo Lake.
highlights:
Phoksundo Lake
Shey Gompa
High Himalayan passes
itinerary:
Day 1-3: Flight to Dunai
Day 4-10: Trekking to Phoksundo
Day 11-18: Crossing high passes to Shey Gompa
Day 19-22: Return trek and flights
inclusions: Expedition equipment, All permits, Expert guides, All meals
